# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -O common-tosca-modeldesigner-1.0.0-RC0-linux.gtk.x86_64.tar.gz https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1052/org/openo/common-tosca/model-designer/modeldesigner/distribution/modeldesigner-standalone/1.0.0-RC0/modeldesigner-standalone-1.0.0-RC0-linux.gtk.x86_64.tar.gz
RUN tar -xf common-tosca-modeldesigner-1.0.0-RC0-linux.gtk.x86_64.tar.gz
RUN rm -f common-tosca-modeldesigner-1.0.0-RC0-linux.gtk.x86_64.tar.gz
EXPOSE 8202
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0-RC0 autorelease-1052 > VERSION
